translation.en: [woman] Here I am, 22 years old,
translation.zh: 这是我 22岁

translation.en: being whisked away with the man I love,
translation.zh: 正在和我爱的男人

translation.en: with three million dollars.
translation.zh: 带着300万美元一起匆忙逃跑

translation.en: It is a fantasy dream that was a reality back in 1993.
translation.zh: 这个梦幻的故事 真实地发生在1993年

translation.en: Holy cow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [newswoman 1] Everyone who comes to Vegas hopes to score that elusive jackpot.
translation.zh: 每个来拉斯维加斯的人 都想得到终极大奖

translation.en: [newsman 1] Heather Tallchief appears to have gotten away with what some may call the perfect crime.
translation.zh: 海瑟·塔奇夫似乎在完美犯罪后 成功逃脱了

translation.en: [newswoman 1] Heather Catherine Tallchief vanished on Friday along with the Loomis armored van.
translation.zh: 海瑟·凯瑟琳·塔奇夫 和卢米斯运钞车一起在周五消失了

translation.en: [newsman 2] In Las Vegas today, a suspect in one of the most infamous armored car heists
translation.zh: 在当今的拉斯维加斯 一个最臭名昭著的运钞车抢劫嫌犯

translation.en: remains on the run.
translation.zh: 直到今天还未被抓获

translation.en: [newswoman 2] No one has seen her, the truck, or the money since Friday.
translation.zh: 从周五开始 就再也没人见到过她 运钞车 或是那些现金

translation.en: [newsman 3] This beautiful young woman got away with millions.
translation.zh: 这个漂亮的年轻小姑娘 带着百万巨款逃走了

translation.en: [newsman 4] A 21-year-old pulling off a multimillion-dollar caper?
translation.zh: 一个21岁的人劫走了几百万美元？

translation.en: No one could believe it.
translation.zh: 没人能相信

translation.en: [newsman 5] The armored truck was packed
translation.zh: 运钞车上装载了

translation.en: with more than three million dollars in cash.
translation.zh: 超过300万美元的现金

translation.en: An absolutely incredible real-life crime story
translation.zh: 一个相当不可思议的真实犯罪故事

translation.en: straight out of a Hollywood script.
translation.zh: 简直是脱胎自好莱坞的剧本

translation.en: [newsman 6] A story of sex, magick, money, murder.
translation.zh: 性爱魔力、金钱谋杀的故事

translation.en: One of the biggest heists in Las Vegas history.
translation.zh: 拉斯维加斯历史上最大的抢劫案之一

translation.en: This is a love story at heart.
translation.zh: 这实质上是一个爱情故事

translation.en: The prince who took the princess and, against all odds,
translation.zh: 王子带着公主 冲破所有阻碍

translation.en: whisked her away on this wild ride into the sunset.
translation.zh: 带着她踏上冒险之旅 永远幸福

translation.en: We're in a bar, and this guy came up to me and asked,
translation.zh: 我们在一家酒吧里 这个人跑过来问我… （1993年）

translation.en: "Can I buy you a drink or something?"
translation.zh: “我能请你喝一杯吗？”

translation.en: "Yeah, okay."
translation.zh: “好吧 可以”

translation.en: Because I didn't have a single dollar to my name,
translation.zh: （抢劫9个月前） 我名下一分钱都没有 不骗你

translation.en: I kid you not.
translation.zh: 我名下一分钱都没有 不骗你

translation.en: And he just… He was just flirtatious and full of charisma.
translation.zh: 而他是…他是个很会撩 并且充满魅力的人

translation.en: He asked me something weird.
translation.zh: 他问了我一些奇怪的事

translation.en: Something like, "Do you believe in the devil?"
translation.zh: 比如“你相信魔鬼吗？”

translation.en: And I'm like, "Well… that depends on whether or not one considers that there's a God."
translation.zh: 我说：“这取决于一个人 是否认为有上帝存在”

translation.en: Ask me a dumb question, I'm gonna give you a dumb answer back.
translation.zh: 问我一个蠢问题 我会回你一个愚蠢的答案

translation.en: Yet I was kind of chuckling, 'cause that's not the usual pick-up line.
translation.zh: 但我还是笑了起来 因为这不是常见的搭讪话题

translation.en: So, I was like, "Okay, this will be interesting."
translation.zh: 所以我想“好吧 这会很有趣的”

translation.en: "I'm gonna engage here on this one."
translation.zh: “我要吸引住这个人”

translation.en: So, he says, "Do you wanna go do a line?"
translation.zh: 于是他说：“你想来吸点吗？”

translation.en: And I'm like, "Well, yeah."
translation.zh: 我说：“好啊”

translation.en: I was like… "What is all this?"
translation.zh: 我说：“这都是什么啊？”

translation.en: He was really into a lot of eclectic mysticism,
translation.zh: 他很喜欢许多不拘一格的神秘主义

translation.en: pagan-type thoughts, sex magick.
translation.zh: 异教徒的思想、性爱魔力

translation.en: And he's like, "This is my little altar where I do a lot of goddess worship."
translation.zh: 他说： “这是我供奉许多女神的小祭坛”

translation.en: Well, he would write poetry, and I remember him reading quite a bit.
translation.zh: 他会写诗 我记得他还读很多书

translation.en: It was pretty dope.
translation.zh: 还挺酷的

translation.en: [Solis on recording] The love of a woman stumbles drunk into my tavern,
translation.zh: 一个女人的爱 醉倒在我的酒馆里

translation.en: and I break the law, serving it wine.
translation.zh: 我违反法律 斟上了红酒

translation.en: And I chance disaster…
translation.zh: 我很可能会因此蒙灾…

translation.en: [Heather] The headspace I was in at the time I met Solis
translation.zh: 我遇到索利斯的那时候 我的情绪很杂乱

translation.en: was very disjointed, very disconnected, very disillusional.
translation.zh: 我遇到索利斯的那时候 我的情绪很杂乱 很断线、很幻灭

translation.en: [Solis] …and surrender to, guilty of everything.
translation.zh: 也被各种罪恶感所包围

translation.en: [Heather] I was a certified nurse's assistant.
translation.zh: 我当时是一名注册护士助理

translation.en: The majority of the people that I took care of had full-blown AIDS.
translation.zh: 我照顾的大多数人都有完全型艾滋病

translation.en: Young, twenty-year-olds. You get attached to these folks.
translation.zh: 年轻、20出头的 接触的都是这些人

translation.en: I remember being in the room when someone passed away.
translation.zh: 我记得我还在病房里有人就去世了

translation.en: It's the most profound thing you'll ever feel.
translation.zh: 这是你有生以来最深刻的感受

translation.en: I just wanted to escape.
translation.zh: 我只想逃离

translation.en: A girl at work introduced crack cocaine.
translation.zh: 一个一起工作的女孩 介绍了快客可卡因

translation.en: It was a very, very quick downward spiral.
translation.zh: 这是一个飞速下降的堕落螺旋

translation.en: I lost my job, was going nowhere.
translation.zh: 我丢了工作 没有地方可去

translation.en: So, when I discovered all of these metaphysical concepts,
translation.zh: 所以 当我发现了这些玄学的概念

translation.en: it made me feel like I'm not floating out here in the ether.
translation.zh: 这让我觉得我还没有脱离人生轨道

translation.en: It was a feeling of discovery,
translation.zh: 这是一种发现新大陆的感觉

translation.en: and finding something about yourself that was never really apparent before.
translation.zh: 发现了自己身上从来没显露过的东西

translation.en: [Solis] The poetry I write brings out a warrior consciousness.
translation.zh: 我写的诗歌颂了勇士的觉悟

translation.en: We emerge as the living, the strong, the willing.
translation.zh: 我们以 生者、强者、自愿者的身份出现

translation.en: [Heather] He was the stillness in the eye of the storm.
translation.zh: 他是风暴眼中的宁静

translation.en: He gave a sense of purpose…
translation.zh: 他给人一种目标感…

translation.en: direction, security.
translation.zh: 方向感、安全感

translation.en: I ended up moving in with him not long after that.
translation.zh: 于是 我不久之后就搬去了他家

translation.en: He made me feel like a queen.
translation.zh: 他让我感觉像个女王

translation.en: I'm talking flowers, white doves, petals on the floor.
translation.zh: 我说的是花、白鸽子、地板上的花瓣

translation.en: The kind of Romeo that's cliché and kind of like, "Oh, please."
translation.zh: 那种老套的罗密欧式浪漫 像是说：“噢 求你”

translation.en: But yet the female part of me loves that.
translation.zh: 但我女性的一面喜欢这个

translation.en: It was easy, it was comforting.
translation.zh: 很简单、很舒服

translation.en: It was very safe.
translation.zh: 也很安全

translation.en: However I define love, he was that definition.
translation.zh: 不管我怎样定义爱 他就是那个标准答案

translation.en: [Heather] I wasn't naive to the fact that he was a career criminal.
translation.zh: 我没有天真到忽略他是个职业罪犯

translation.en: He was already an outlaw when I met him.
translation.zh: 我认识他时 他已经是个逃犯了

translation.en: Chaos is exciting. Chaos is sexy.
translation.zh: 混乱很刺激 混乱很性感

translation.en: One night he calls me up and he's like, "I need you to be ready to go."
translation.zh: 有一天晚上 他打电话给我说： “我需要你准备好出发”

translation.en: And I'm like, "Go where?"
translation.zh: 我说：“出发去哪儿？”

translation.en: And he's just, "Be ready to go, bring clothes."
translation.zh: 他说：“准备好出发 带上衣服”

translation.en: So we go to the back of this mall, and my job is to sit in the car with the key
translation.zh: 我们去到那个商场后面 我的工作是拿着钥匙坐在车里

translation.en: and make sure nothing happens to the car.
translation.zh: 保证车子不会出什么差错

translation.en: Meanwhile, he conducted a robbery.
translation.zh: 同时 他实施了抢劫

translation.en: I remember him breaking into the lockbox,
translation.zh: 我记得他闯进去 打开保险箱

translation.en: and there was something like 30 grand in this box.
translation.zh: 然后里面有大概三万美元

translation.en: And a very nice gold Rolex.
translation.zh: 还有一只漂亮的金劳力士 （三万美元）

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.zh: 我当时说…

translation.en: "Oh, that's nice. Let me wear that."
translation.zh: （9600美元） “太好看了 让我戴一下吧”

translation.en: "What are you doing?"
translation.zh: “你在干什么？”

translation.en: He's like, "This'll get you in trouble. This is identifiable."
translation.zh: 他说：“这会带来麻烦的 太显眼了”

translation.en: Las Vegas was where he was gonna hit.
translation.zh: 拉斯维加斯正是他要大展身手的地方

translation.en: It was an opportunity to try a new path.
translation.zh: 那是一个尝试新路子的机会

translation.en: We were gonna hit big.
translation.zh: 我们要来一票大的

translation.en: Well, here's a man who was really keen on accumulating wealth,
translation.zh: 这个人很渴望积累自己的财富

translation.en: but not in any kind of traditional way.
translation.zh: 但不是以用任何传统的方式

translation.en: He was always trying to hit big by doing something totally off the wall.
translation.zh: 他总是异想天开 做出格的事情挣大钱

translation.en: Selling a boat, selling art, playing craps.
translation.zh: 卖船、卖艺术品、 赌博

translation.en: Working hard, clocking in, clocking out, was not an option.
translation.zh: 努力工作、按时上班、按时下班 不在他的考虑中

translation.en: "Why don't we just get jobs?"
translation.zh: “我们为什么不直接找工作呢？”

translation.en: He's like, "You're a fool if you think that's gonna happen that way."
translation.zh: 他会说：“如果你以为这样能赚大钱 那你就是个傻瓜”

translation.en: I just got absorbed in this whole feeling of security,
translation.zh: 我只是沉浸在这种安全感

translation.en: and this warmth.
translation.zh: 和温暖之中

translation.en: "Somebody's really invested in me." Never really experienced that before.
translation.zh: “真的有人全心全意投入在我身上” 以前从没有这样的感觉

translation.en: I was born Kensington-Bailey area of Buffalo.
translation.zh: 我出生在水牛城的肯辛顿-贝利区

translation.en: Our house was a big, beautiful house on the corner of Comstock and Amherst,
translation.zh: （1978年） 我们家住在康斯托克和阿默斯特街角 一个又大又漂亮的房子里

translation.en: and it was the spot.
translation.zh: 就是在这儿

translation.en: Dad was "The Dude."
translation.zh: 爸爸外号叫“老兄”

translation.en: [Fred] Let me tell you something.
translation.zh: （弗莱德·塔奇夫 海瑟的父亲） 我跟你说

translation.en: We were smoking weed one day, and were putting, uh, formaldehyde on it.
translation.zh: 我们有一天在抽大麻 然后往上加了点甲醛

translation.en: It's like doing horse tranquilizer.
translation.zh: 抽起来就像是K粉

translation.en: You put it on the weed and it just like… I was giving it to heroin addicts
translation.zh: 你把它涂在大麻上然后就… 我把它给了抽海洛因的人

translation.en: and they were just freaking out, like, "This stuff's bad." You know?
translation.zh: 他们吓坏了 说：“这东西不好抽”

translation.en: You don't smoke formaldehyde, you know? You don't put that shit in your system.
translation.zh: 你不能抽甲醛 你不能把那东西吸进身体 那是他们处理尸体用的

translation.en: That's what they do to dead bodies, you know?
translation.zh: 你不能把那东西吸进身体 那是他们处理尸体用的

translation.en: But I wanted to get high at all costs.
translation.zh: 但是为了吸高兴 我什么都愿意

translation.en: A lot of people would just hang out on the front stoop drinking.
translation.zh: 很多人会出来在门前喝点酒

translation.en: I remember being little
translation.zh: 我记得小时候

translation.en: and the police coming on different occasions.
translation.zh: 在不同的场合 警察都来过

translation.en: Fights, there was always some kind of domestic fight.
translation.zh: 打架 总是有因为家庭纠纷打起来的

translation.en: [Titus] I remember coming, like next morning, waking up,
translation.zh: 我记得第二天早上醒来后 下楼后…

translation.en: coming downstairs, there might be bodies laying around.
translation.zh: 可能就有人倒在地上

translation.en: People passed out on the floor, on a couch, on a chair,
translation.zh: 人们在地板上、沙发上、椅子上 甚至厨房地板上

translation.en: on the kitchen floor.
translation.zh: 就晕过去了

translation.en: And just trying to find out which one's my mom, which one's my dad.
translation.zh: 我就得试着找出 哪个是我妈妈 哪个是我爸爸

translation.en: "I think I gotta go to school."
translation.zh: “我还得去上学呢”

translation.en: [Heather] My mother and father had me while they were still in high school.
translation.zh: 我的父母在高中时就有了我

translation.en: [Fred] We had sex, but it was just a mistake, and then we had… she got pregnant.
translation.zh: 我们做爱了 但那只是个错误 然后她怀孕了

translation.en: I didn't know anything. I didn't know a girl got pregnant, nobody told me they got pregnant.
translation.zh: 我不知道女生会怀孕 没人告诉我她们会怀孕

translation.en: "What do you mean you're pregnant? When did this happen?"
translation.zh: “你说你怀孕了是什么意思？”

translation.en: Then we had Heather.
translation.zh: 然后我们就有了希瑟

translation.en: [Heather] So, shotgun wedding. My mother and father didn't last very long.
translation.zh: 所以 是奉子成婚 我妈妈和爸爸没能维持太久

translation.en: [Fred] I get a letter in the mail says I'm divorced,
translation.zh: 我邮箱里收到一封信 说我离婚了

translation.en: and I have custody of this child. I get custody of Heather.
translation.zh: 我有这个孩子的监护权 我得到海瑟的监护权

translation.en: Who would give custody to this damn drunken fool?
translation.zh: 谁会给一个该死的醉鬼监护权？

translation.en: Custody of a three-year-old child, two-year-old child, whatever she was.
translation.zh: 不管怎么说 那是一个三岁小孩的监护权

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 我是说 这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: One day we were hanging out, drinking and partying,
translation.zh: 有一天 我们在开派对

translation.en: this girl, Cindy, she liked what we were doing,
translation.zh: 有个女孩 辛蒂 她喜欢我们做的事

translation.en: getting high all the time, and she fit right in.
translation.zh: 一直保持嗨的状态 她也融入了进来

translation.en: She'd need a place to stay and I said, "Hey, you could stay here."
translation.zh: 她需要一个地方住 我说：“你可以留在这里”

translation.en: "Help me watch my daughter." And she never left.
translation.zh: “帮我照顾我女儿” 然后她就再没离开过

translation.en: [Heather] There was some resentment there, because she was not my mother.
translation.zh: 这里面有一些怨念 因为她不是我妈妈

translation.en: I'm Fred's child, and she's having to care for me.
translation.zh: 我是弗莱德的孩子 而她必须照顾我

translation.en: It was very, very clear how much she hated me,
translation.zh: 她有多恨我 是非常明显的

translation.en: and she would let me know.
translation.zh: 她不会告诉我的

translation.en: Tell me what a fucking failure I am.
translation.zh: 告诉我 我是个彻头彻尾的意外

translation.en: Nobody wanted me.
translation.zh: 没人想要我

translation.en: Who would care about me?
translation.zh: 谁会在乎我吗？

translation.en: "Your own mother doesn't want you. I don't want you."
translation.zh: “你自己的亲生母亲不想要你 我也不想要你”

translation.en: I mean, I'm going to fucking kindergarten.
translation.zh: 我说 我要去该死的幼儿园

translation.en: If you've never been loved in your family,
translation.zh: 如果你在家人里从没得到过爱

translation.en: if you've never been shown any kind of, like, warmth,
translation.zh: 如果你从来没有得到过温暖

translation.en: or this sincere affection just for you…
translation.zh: 或是只为你一人的这种真挚情感…

translation.en: and a man is finally gonna come and proclaim this love
translation.zh: 终于有一个男人来表现这份爱

translation.en: and all of these other wonderful things…
translation.zh: 和所有其他美好的事情…

translation.en: I would have just done anything. I really would have.
translation.zh: 我愿意为他做任何事 我真的愿意

translation.en: The tarot cards would reinforce these readings of extreme good luck,
translation.zh: 塔罗牌会加强这些 显示出的极端好运… （好运 富足 财富）

translation.en: success, wealth.
translation.zh: （好运 富足 财富） …成功、财富

translation.en: But I'm like, "How are we gonna do it?"
translation.zh: 但我心想：“我们要怎么做？”

translation.en: And that's where the sex magick starts coming into play.
translation.zh: 这就是性爱魔力开始发挥作用的时候

translation.en: [Solis on recording] The sighs and groans of an ecstatic woman…
translation.zh: （欣喜若狂的女人的叹息和呻吟…）

translation.en: [Heather] The highest achievement of sex is orgasm.
translation.zh: 性的最高成就是高潮

translation.en: But after that release, it's done.
translation.zh: 但在释放之后 就结束了

translation.en: Where does this energy go?
translation.zh: 这种能量流向了哪里？

translation.en: It's just expended out into the ether.
translation.zh: 它只是被释放到以太里

translation.en: So how do you harness this energy?
translation.zh: 那你要怎样才能利用这种能量呢？

translation.en: The end goal is to actually speak something into existence.
translation.zh: 最终的目标是说出实际的话

translation.en: [Solis] Freedom released in the psychic explosions of energy.
translation.zh: 在精神能量的爆炸中释放自由

translation.en: Abracadabra.
translation.zh: 天灵灵地灵灵

translation.en: In our case, the goal was to make some money.
translation.zh: 我们的情况中 目标是挣钱

translation.en: The money's dwindling, We need jobs.
translation.zh: 钱越来越少 我们需要工作

translation.en: And he's like, "Why don't we get you a security job?"
translation.zh: 然后他说：“我们不如 给你找个安保工作？” （零美元）

translation.en: So I applied for a position at Loomis.
translation.zh: 于是我申请了卢米斯的一个职位

translation.en: [man] Whether by cash, check, or electronic transfer…
translation.zh: 无论是现金、支票还是电子转账

translation.en: we're part of how you spend your money.
translation.zh: 我们都是你消费过程的一环

translation.en: They asked if I had ever done a job like this before, and I said no.
translation.zh: 他们问我以前是否做过类似的工作 我说没有

translation.en: But they needed to hire a certain amount of females.
translation.zh: 但他们需要雇用一定数量的女性

translation.en: Fuck, yeah. Click.
translation.zh: 真他妈行 成了

translation.en: [man] Hey, Heather.
translation.zh: 嗨 海瑟

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嗨 各位

translation.en: [Heather] I didn't know my way around Las Vegas.
translation.zh: （卢米斯） 我不清楚拉斯维加斯这儿的路

translation.en: Probably only had my license for a couple of months.
translation.zh: 我可能才拿完驾照几个月

translation.en: [man] She either was a naturally bad driver or had just learned how to drive.
translation.zh: 她要么是天生的差司机 要么就是刚学会开车

translation.en: -She used to two-pedal the… Remember that? -Two-pedal and…
translation.zh: -她曾经两脚一起踩… -油门和刹车 （史考特和史蒂夫 卢米斯同事）

translation.en: And remember she hit me with the truck one time?
translation.zh: 记得她有一次开车撞到我吗？

translation.en: And couldn't… Yeah, she couldn't stop at stop lights, stop signs either.
translation.zh: 对 她也不在停止信号 停车标志前停车

translation.en: She got hired by our branch manager at the time

translation.en: And I think he…
translation.zh: 我觉得他…

translation.en: She just snowballed him. I really do.
translation.zh: 她就是迷倒了他 我真这么觉得

translation.en: [Scott] The ATM truck is a three-person team.
translation.zh: ATM运钞车是一个三人小组 有一个是司机

translation.en: You have the driver and then you have the two employees in the back
translation.zh: ATM运钞车是一个三人小组 有一个是司机 还有两个员工在后面搬运现金

translation.en: that actually handle the money.
translation.zh: 还有两个员工在后面搬运现金

translation.en: We serviced ATM machines on the… all the casinos,
translation.zh: 我们为…所有赌场的ATM机 和美国银行的机器

translation.en: and Bank of America machines.
translation.zh: 提供服务

translation.en: Ah, we'd go in, remove all the cash that was in the machines,
translation.zh: 我们过去 搬走所有机器里的现金

translation.en: and replace it with brand new cash.
translation.zh: 换上成捆的全新钞票

translation.en: [Heather] There was in excess of, like, four or five million on certain days.
translation.zh: 有那么几天能超过四、五百万

translation.en: I would tell Solis,
translation.zh: 我会告诉索利斯…

translation.en: "You should see all the money in the back of it."
translation.zh: “你真应该去看看车后面那么多钱”

translation.en: We're laying in bed discussing things.
translation.zh: 我们躺在床上讨论事情

translation.en: He used to ask me how was my day.
translation.zh: 他经常问我：“今天过得怎么样？”

translation.en: "Oh, God, I don't know."
translation.zh: “天啊 我不知道”

translation.en: "Monday, we got to go to the west. Tuesday, this."
translation.zh: “周一 我们得去西边 星期二 这边”

translation.en: "What days, you think, are the more… like, the heavier days?"
translation.zh: “哪几天 你觉得 是最… 钱最多的时候？”

translation.en: And over time, I could see that I was telling him what he needed.
translation.zh: 久而久之 我就能看出来 我在告诉他 他需要的信息

translation.en: And it becomes a plan slowly.
translation.zh: 然后就慢慢变成了计划

translation.en: And then he said, "Could I write down the routes?"
translation.zh: （380万美元） 然后他说：“我能记下路线吗？”

translation.en: And he would take my notes and follow…
translation.zh: （周一 早8:30 离开卢米斯） 他会记下我的笔记 然后跟踪…

translation.en: so that he could see what that Monday route looked like.
translation.zh: 这样他就能看到周一的路线 是什么样的

translation.en: What did that Tuesday route look like?
translation.zh: 星期二的路线是什么样的？

translation.en: What did that Wednesday route look like?
translation.zh: 星期三的路线是什么样的？

translation.en: Go at different times of the day, go at different times of the week.
translation.zh: 每天不同的时间去 每周不同时间去

translation.en: See what's going on with the environments and surroundings.
translation.zh: 看看周边环境都怎么样

translation.en: What was it like at nine o'clock in the morning, what was it like at ten?
translation.zh: 早上九点是什么情况 十点呢？

translation.en: What kind of activities are going on? Where are the security guards?
translation.zh: 在进行什么样的行动？ 保安都在哪儿？

translation.en: Obviously, I told him which day was my heaviest day,
translation.zh: 很显然 我告诉了他哪一天 是钱最多的一天

translation.en: and the beginnings of this heist is starting to come into formation.
translation.zh: 这次抢劫计划的雏形开始形成

translation.en: We're gonna take this truck full of money.
translation.zh: 我们要把这辆装满钱的卡车劫走

translation.en: Circus Circus was the first service point straight out from the yard.
translation.zh: 马戏团酒店是从单位出发的 第一个服务点

translation.en: And they only took what they were using to service those machines,
translation.zh: 他们只拿上足够供给那些机器的现金

translation.en: so the majority of the money was still with me.
translation.zh: 所以大部分现金还是在我身边

translation.en: [Scott] It was the only location that we would have to be dropped off at one spot
translation.zh: 那是我们唯一必须在一个地方下车

translation.en: and picked up on a completely different area.
translation.zh: 然后在另一个区域上车的地点

translation.en: From where we get dropped off to where we get picked up,
translation.zh: 从我们下车的地方到我们上车的地方 我们有…

translation.en: we have six or eight ATM machines,
translation.zh: 从我们下车的地方到我们上车的地方 我们有… 六到八台ATM机 它们在建筑的各个角落

translation.en: and they're in various locations of the building.
translation.zh: 六到八台ATM机 它们在建筑的各个角落

translation.en: [Heather] They're in there for a really long time on that day.
translation.zh: 那天他们在里面待了很久

translation.en: I expressed that to Solis.
translation.zh: 我和索利斯说过

translation.en: "This is what I'm seeing, and these guys take forever in there."
translation.zh: “我看到的就是 这些人像是呆里面不出来了”

translation.en: And he's like, "That's where this will happen."
translation.zh: 他说：“就在这里动手”

translation.en: Because they're gone for a long time, they won't recognize
translation.zh: 因为他们已经离开车很久 他们不会意识到

translation.en: or be alerted to the fact that I'm missing.
translation.zh: 或者被警告我已经失踪的事实

translation.en: Maybe they'll think I forgot to go to the other entrance.
translation.zh: 也许他们会以为我忘了去另一个入口

translation.en: [Steve] She couldn't remember the route week by week.
translation.zh: 她几个星期来都记不清路线

translation.en: We'd come in and go out the same doors.
translation.zh: 我们会进出同一个门

translation.en: And… [chuckles] …she'd forget,
translation.zh: 她会忘了 她会去其他地方

translation.en: and she'd move around to some other place and then we'd have to go locate her.
translation.zh: 她会忘了 她会去其他地方 我们还要去定位她

translation.en: She could never remember exactly how to get to a machine or where to park.
translation.zh: 她永远都不记得 该怎么去取款机或是停在哪里

translation.en: And then he rented the garage, which was a ploy,

translation.en: and he had put a banner on the outside of it,
translation.zh: 然后他在外面拉了一道横幅

translation.en: as if we're gonna do something for your vehicle.
translation.zh: 像是我们要为您的车辆提供服务

translation.en: This is where things started becoming more solidified.
translation.zh: （钣金加强服务） 计划就是从这里开始变得更加具体

translation.en: It was determined that on a Friday, when they left to go in there,
translation.zh: 这事被定在了周五 当他们下车进去的时候

translation.en: that would be the opportune time.
translation.zh: 那就是我们的时机

translation.en: Because they only took a few bags each to do their ATM stock.
translation.zh: 因为他们每人只拿几个袋子 去更换ATM机的库存

translation.en: And then I would drive to that garage.
translation.zh: 然后我会开车去那个车库

translation.en: There was a neighbor next door. And he tried to engage us in conversation one time.
translation.zh: 我们隔壁有个邻居 他有一次想跟我们聊天

translation.en: And I'm like, "Oh, hey! Hi, hello."
translation.zh: 我就说：“嗨 你们好啊”

translation.en: And he's like, "So, what do you guys… What kind of business is this?"
translation.zh: 他说：“你们这是什么生意？”

translation.en: And I'm like, "Yeah, you know, it's, like, an armored car repair service."
translation.zh: 我只好说：“你懂的 这是装甲车维修服务”

translation.en: And then Solis would be like, "Stop fucking talking to people."
translation.zh: 索利斯说：“少他妈跟别人说话”

translation.en: "The fuck you doing? This person can identify you."
translation.zh: “你他妈在干什么？这个人能认出你”

translation.en: The man was not a stupid criminal.
translation.zh: 这个人可不是一个愚蠢的罪犯

translation.en: Okay. I'm in deeper than I probably can manage.
translation.zh: 好吧 事情已经超出了 我能够掌控的程度

translation.en: I think he could sense some little trepidation inside of me.
translation.zh: 我觉得他能感觉到我内心的恐惧

translation.en: Life moved very quickly for me and it was like a blur.
translation.zh: 生活对我来说变化非常快 已经模糊不清了

translation.en: As things went on,
translation.zh: 随着事情的发展

translation.en: I knew I was not gonna be well received if I expressed to him how…
translation.zh: 我知道我不会被好好答复 如果我向他表达我有多… （抢劫两周前）

translation.en: "I don't know about this. I'm scared."
translation.zh: “我不知道怎么办 我很害怕”

translation.en: [Solis, softly] Stay focused.
translation.zh: 保持专注

translation.en: [Heather] He would play these self-hypnotizing tapes
translation.zh: 他会播放那些自我催眠的录像 来帮助我建立自信

translation.en: to help build my confidence, calm my nerves.
translation.zh: 他会播放那些自我催眠的录像 来帮助我建立自信 舒缓我的紧张

translation.en: In a way, I didn't think it was really gonna ever happen.
translation.zh: 在某种程度上 我没想到这真的会发生

translation.en: I decided not to address those feelings and those fears.
translation.zh: 我决定不理会这些感受和恐惧

translation.en: They had to go away, to disappear.
translation.zh: 它们必须离开 必须消失

translation.en: Do you think I'm gonna be like, "Oh, no, honey."
translation.zh: 你觉得我会说：“不行 亲爱的”

translation.en: "As much as this sounds great, I think I'm gonna bow out now."
translation.zh: “尽管这听起来不错 我现在要退出了”

translation.en: Saying no to him was not an option.
translation.zh: 拒绝他是不可能的

translation.en: This is a man who lived a very violent life.
translation.zh: 这个人过着很暴力的生活

translation.en: [newswoman] Today, a murderer was paroled from a life sentence
translation.zh: 今天 一个无期徒刑的杀人犯因为他的诗

translation.en: because of his poetry. A so-called "prison poet."
translation.zh: 得以假释 一位所谓的“监狱诗人”

translation.en: Let me go with my chest raised high…
translation.zh: 让我随我的胸膛起伏…

translation.en: [newswoman] Roberto Solis, also known as Pancho Aguila,
translation.zh: 罗伯托·索利斯 也叫做潘乔·阿吉拉 （《潘乔·阿吉拉诗集》）

translation.en: was sentenced to life in prison for the brutal murder
translation.zh: …在1969年一次拙劣的抢劫中

translation.en: of Loomis armored car guard Louis Dake during a botched robbery in 1969.
translation.zh: 因谋杀卢米斯运钞车保安 路易斯·戴克被判无期徒刑

translation.en: While serving at Folsom Prison, Solis wrote five books of poetry
translation.zh: 在福尔森监狱服刑时 索利斯写了五本书… （福尔森监狱的诗人和作家）

translation.en: and has won wide acclaim.
translation.zh: …并赢得了很多赞誉

translation.en: It was a recent letter-writing campaign
translation.zh: 在最近的联名信中

translation.en: involving several prominent poets and publishers
translation.zh: 包括一些著名的诗人和出版商在内 他们说服了假释委员会

translation.en: that convinced the parole board.
translation.zh: 包括一些著名的诗人和出版商在内 他们说服了假释委员会 （百分百美国人）

translation.en: And so today, he finds himself free
translation.zh: （他是没有门徒的甘地） 所以 今天 在无期徒刑

translation.en: after serving only 23 years of that life sentence.
translation.zh: 服刑仅仅二十三年后 他自由了

translation.en: [Solis, echoing] After 16 years of imprisonment,
translation.zh: 在十六年的关押后

translation.en: all the rosy-colored eyeglasses have been shattered…
translation.zh: 对世间一切美好的向往都已经破碎了

translation.en: …to be replaced by a clear vision of history and human nature.
translation.zh: 都被一个 对历史和人类本质的清醒认知所代替

translation.en: [Heather] Solis felt he deserved this
translation.zh: 索利斯觉得那是他罪有应得

translation.en: because of what the Loomis robbery had taken from him.
translation.zh: 因为卢米斯抢劫案夺走了他很多东西

translation.en: The years Loomis had taken.
translation.zh: 卢米斯夺走的他的岁月

translation.en: So, he was gonna get back, somehow.
translation.zh: 所以 他想要以某种方式报复

translation.en: You're dealing with an individual that's capable of cold-blooded murder,
translation.zh: 你面对的是一个能冷血杀人的罪犯

translation.en: but I didn't focus on that at the time.
translation.zh: 但是当时我没有关注这点

translation.en: "You deserve to get back what they took from you."
translation.zh: “你理应拿回从你身上被夺走的东西”

translation.en: "We deserve this. This is our destiny."
translation.zh: “这是我们应得的 这是我们的命运”

translation.en: You convince yourself
translation.zh: 因为你爱着那个人

translation.en: that what you're doing is the right thing to do.
translation.zh: 你说服了自己

translation.en: Because you love that person.
translation.zh: 你在做的是正确的事

translation.en: I loved him unconditionally, without a doubt,
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 我无条件 毫无质疑地爱着他

translation.en: and I was gonna be there with him regardless of what your subconscious says.
translation.zh: 不管潜意识里怎么想 我都会支持他

translation.en: We weren't taking from Joe Schmo, who's a blue-collar worker,
translation.zh: 我们抢劫的 不是身为蓝领工人的民众

translation.en: or someone like my old man that punched a clock.
translation.zh: 或是像我老爸那样靠工资维生的人

translation.en: We weren't hurting somebody that was working hard,
translation.zh: 我们不会伤害到那些努力工作

translation.en: just trying to provide for their family.
translation.zh: 只想努力供养他们家庭的人

translation.en: We were taking from a conglomerate.
translation.zh: 我们抢劫的是一个财团

translation.en: I was right there with him. I wasn't gonna let him down.
translation.zh: 我会和他一起 我不会让他失望的

translation.en: To be honest, I wanted it too.
translation.zh: 老实说 我也想要钱

translation.en: I wanted some opulent shit in my life. I wanted material wealth.
translation.zh: 我想在生活中享受奢华的东西 我想要物质财富

translation.en: We had all these grand ideas, like what to do with the money.
translation.zh: 我们有很多宏大计划 比如花钱做什么

translation.en: We'll live on a farm, we'll have goats, we'll have chickens,
translation.zh: 我们要住在农场里 我们要养山羊 我们要养鸡

translation.en: we'll be self-sufficient, we'll have solar power.
translation.zh: 我们可以自给自足 我们要用太阳能

translation.en: We wanted utopia.
translation.zh: 我们想要一个乌托邦

translation.en: We knew once I was driving away, we'd have less than an hour
translation.zh: 我们知道一旦我开车离开 在拉斯维加斯警察开始搜捕我们之前

translation.en: before every cop in Vegas was looking for me.
translation.zh: 我们只有不到一个小时的时间

translation.zh: 问题是如何在没人注意情况下 转移数百万现金？

translation.en: He took control of that situation, I just went along with it.
translation.zh: 他负责控制这种局面 我只是跟着同意了

translation.en: In the meantime, we had to figure out what to do with me.
translation.zh: 同时 我们得想办法解决我的问题

translation.en: How to get from garage point to this airplane and beyond
translation.zh: 那天晚上 从车库地点到飞机上去时

translation.zh: 我要如何看起来不像是

translation.zh: 新闻里的那个女孩

translation.zh: 我们该怎么做 才能让自己看起来最不像自己？

translation.zh: 我说：“我可以戴一顶金发假发”

translation.zh: 他说：“不 你只是…你还不明白”

translation.zh: “我们给你戴一顶白色假发 你就看着老一点”

translation.zh: 所以 白色假发、冒牌眼镜

translation.en: and I'm like, "Oh… Ohh!"
translation.zh: 我就看起来…

translation.en: "Clever."
translation.zh: “聪明”

translation.zh: 建立抢劫计划 是通过长时间的观察

translation.en: And let's reinforce it now with this practice of sex magick.
translation.zh: 现在我们用性爱魔力的练习来加强

translation.en: This is all the energy that we've expended.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要消耗的所有能量

translation.en: We're tapping into this resource, and it's gonna come back.
translation.zh: 我们正在利用这个资源 最终它会回到体内

translation.en: And he was like, "We gotta do a couple test runs,
translation.zh: 然后他说：“我们要模拟几次撤离

translation.en: make sure you're confident, you're smooth,
translation.zh: 确保你足够自信 足够熟练

translation.en: you're not making any mistakes, you're not making any wrong turns."
translation.zh: 你不会犯任何失误 你不能犯任何错”

translation.en: Go through the motions, go through the motions,
translation.zh: 走一遍过场

translation.en: what it would feel like.
translation.zh: 到时候会是什么样的感觉

translation.en: The universe is abundant, and we're part of the universe.
translation.zh: 宇宙是充盈的 而我们是宇宙的一部分

translation.en: So why can't we have some of the abundance?
translation.zh: 那我们为什么不能变得充盈呢？

translation.en: I am the vessel for this magick to be turned into reality.
translation.zh: 我是将魔法变成现实的容器

translation.en: This was our purpose.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的目的

translation.en: Kismet.
translation.zh: 天命

translation.en: We deserve this.
translation.zh: 这是我们应得的

translation.en: This was our destiny.
translation.zh: 这是我们的命运

translation.en: Eight o'clock in the morning, sun's coming up.
translation.zh: 早上八点整 太阳出来了

translation.en: I wasn't crying, I wasn't nervous.
translation.zh: 我没哭 我也不紧张

translation.en: I wasn't trying to be weird. I just go over the plan.
translation.zh: 我没有表现奇怪 我只是重温了一遍计划

translation.en: This is step one, step two, step three,
translation.zh: 这是第一步、第二步、第三步…

translation.en: step four.
translation.zh: 第四步

translation.zh: 在脑子里过一遍

translation.zh: 他准备好了所有服装道具 并且他非常专注

translation.zh: 所有的肾上腺素流过你的血管

translation.zh: 你会说：“我的天呐”

translation.zh: 你知道“这次要来真的了”

translation.zh: 她那天穿了双西装皮鞋

translation.zh: 那不是她平常穿的工作靴

translation.zh: “这不对劲” 我跟我们的业务经理说：“这不对劲”

translation.zh: 我跟我们的业务经理说：“这不对劲”

translation.zh: 他告诉我别担心 赶快上路

translation.zh: 我们在马戏团酒店 有个专门停车的区域

translation.zh: 我们离开的时候 带上了为所有ATM机准备的全部现金

translation.en: Probably about a million. A million and change.
translation.zh: 大概是100万多一点

translation.en: But it was enough to get those ATMs filled for a weekend.
translation.zh: 但这还不够让那些ATM机坚持一周末

translation.zh: 它们已经不存在了

translation.zh: 我左边的一切都不存在了

translation.zh: 我要向右转

translation.en: [Steve] From the time she dropped us off to the time we walked out,
translation.zh: 从她送我们下车到我们走出来

translation.zh: 一切都很正常 直到我们一走出去

translation.en: that's when it became abnormal.
translation.zh: 事情就开始不对劲了

translation.zh: 说到：“好吧 她到哪儿去了？”

translation.en: First thing in my mind wasn't like, "Oh, God, she got into an accident." You know?
translation.zh: 我脑海中的第一个念头不是 “她出意外了”

translation.en: The first thing in my mind was, "She got lost."
translation.zh: 我脑海中的第一个念头是“她迷路了”

translation.en: -[laughs] "She got lost." -Yeah. Basically. And then we're like,
translation.zh: 对 基本上是这样 然后我们说

translation.en: "Oh, man, I bet she's still back there where she dropped us off at."
translation.zh: “我打赌她还在我们下车的地方”

translation.en: [Scott] So then we backtrack to the drop-off point.
translation.zh: 于是我们就回去下车的地点了

translation.en: Your brain starts racing because you're in a potential worst-case scenario
translation.zh: 你的大脑开始加速运转 因为你正处在最糟的情况中

translation.en: with the job that you're supposed to be doing.
translation.zh: 干你应当完成的工作

translation.en: Your vehicle that is your safe haven is gone.
translation.zh: 本应是避风港的车辆不见了

translation.en: I said, "I think the bitch took the truck."
translation.zh: 我说：“我觉得是那个婊子 把车开走了”

translation.en: Anybody seeing us walking out with no truck there, they just could've said,
translation.zh: 任何看到我们没有找到运钞车的人 都可以说：

translation.en: -"Hey, look at these guys." -Yeah.
translation.zh: “看看这俩家伙 提着大帆布袋走来走去”

translation.en: "Walking around with that big canvas bag. I bet there's money in it."
translation.zh: “看看这俩家伙 提着大帆布袋走来走去” “我猜里面还有钱”

translation.en: I'd never been left, like, stranded like that.
translation.zh: 我从来没有这样困窘过

translation.en: If I would've saw her within the next 20 minutes,
translation.zh: 如果我能在接下来的二十分钟内 看到她

translation.en: -I probably would've shot her myself. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 我可能会亲自动手冲她开枪

translation.en: [man] I'm a street cop on the Strip in Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 我是一名拉斯维加斯大道上的巡警

translation.en: We get the call
translation.zh: 我们接到电话…

translation.en: when people are still crying and sweating and blood is still rolling.
translation.zh: （埃德·罗南 警探） …当时人们还在哭 还在紧张流汗 而血还在往外涌

translation.en: Go, go, go. You clear one call, you get another one almost immediately.
translation.zh: 出发 你一挂断电话 立刻就接到另一通电话

translation.en: It's one of the only jobs that you can have where you get to drive fast and mess with people.
translation.zh: 这是唯一你必须开快车 然后扰乱人们的工作之一

translation.en: This particular day, something had happened at Circus Circus.
translation.zh: （抢劫一小时后） 这特别的一天 在马戏团酒店发生了一些事

translation.en: [dispatcher] Four-zero-seven, four-zero-seven, robbery reported at 2880 South Las Vegas Boulevard,
translation.zh: 警码407 拉斯维加斯大道2880号发生抢劫

translation.en: Circus Circus Casino.
translation.zh: 马戏团酒店赌场

translation.en: [Ed] And while I'm en route to the scene, I'm looking for an armored truck.
translation.zh: 在我去现场的路上 我在找一辆运钞车

translation.en: 'Cause I don't know what we have, but I'm looking for that armored truck on the way.
translation.zh: 我不知道我们有什么线索 但是我还是在路上寻找那辆运钞车

translation.en: [Heather] He becomes Dr. Jekyll-Mr. Hyde,
translation.zh: 他们改名换姓了

translation.en: 'cause he's now in this take-charge, "This is what we're doing,
translation.zh: 因为他现在全权负责 “我们接下来要这样

translation.en: you need to just get a grip, take your fucking gun off."
translation.zh: 你需要控制一下自己 把那破枪扔了”

translation.en: And he gets my weapon.
translation.zh: 然后他拿走了我的武器

translation.en: Hurry the fuck up!
translation.zh: 你他妈快点！

translation.en: [Heather] I'm just butt naked in a fucking garage with a man with my gun.
translation.zh: 我在车库里光着屁股 和一个拿着我枪的男人在一起

translation.en: That moment of no return is standing there with your britches down,
translation.zh: 在你脱下裤子 要穿上伪装服装的一刻

translation.en: trying to put on a costume,
translation.zh: 就没有回头路了

translation.en: meanwhile a man convicted of murder is in possession of three million dollars
translation.zh: 同时一个被判过谋杀罪的人 拥有了300万美元

translation.en: and a loaded firearm.
translation.zh: 和一把上膛的枪

translation.en: In a fucking closed garage.
translation.zh: 在一个封闭的车库里

translation.en: That moment of fear hits you, and you're like, "Fuck!"
translation.zh: 那一刻的恐惧击中了你 你会想要骂街

translation.en: I started taking witness statements from the two guards that were there,
translation.zh: 我开始给两位保安录口供

translation.en: and initiated a crime report from Loomis.
translation.zh: 然后草拟一份来自卢米斯的犯罪报告

translation.en: [Scott] I remember it was the FBI, Las Vegas Metro,
translation.zh: 我记得是拉斯维加斯的联邦调查局

translation.en: they had questions. And I don't know, who else?
translation.zh: 他们问了问题 然后我不记得了 还有谁？

translation.en: [Steve] I talked to Chief of Security at Circus Circus.
translation.zh: 我跟马戏团酒店的安保主任谈过了

translation.en: They brought in our Security Vice President…
translation.zh: 他们领来了我们的安保副主席…

translation.en: -Yeah. -…from Houston at the time.
translation.zh: -是的 -…当时从休斯顿赶来

translation.en: Everybody was involved.
translation.zh: 每个人都参与了进来

translation.en: [Ed] I got information
translation.zh: 我收到消息

translation.en: Heather Tallchief had only been working for Loomis for a couple of weeks.
translation.zh: 海瑟·塔奇夫只为卢米斯工作了数周

translation.en: She's sitting alone in the armored truck
translation.zh: 她在没有监管的情况下

translation.en: with a couple of million dollars in cash, unsupervised.
translation.zh: 载着几百万美元现金 独自坐在运钞车上

translation.en: I started thinking this could be a kidnap or a hostage situation.
translation.zh: 我开始觉得这可能是 一起绑架或挟持人质事件

translation.en: The sanctity of life turns it into a whole new deal.
translation.zh: 生命的宝贵 让它变成了一起全新的案件

translation.en: The larceny was no longer foremost in my mind.
translation.zh: 盗窃在我脑海中已经不重要了

translation.en: I was trying to find the armored car so that I could find Heather.
translation.zh: 我试着找到那辆运钞车 这样才能找到海瑟

translation.en: I got a copy of the route they were supposed to go, just to make sure the car wasn't there.
translation.zh: 我拿到了他们路线的副本 以确保车不在那里

translation.en: Every police car in the city are looking for this car.
translation.zh: 全市所有的警车都在找这辆车

translation.en: [Heather] Okay. I'm still here.
translation.zh: 好了 我还在这里

translation.en: [Solis] Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [Heather] We start loading the money up.
translation.zh: 我们开始装钱

translation.en: And then these other fears started coming in,
translation.zh: 然后另一种恐惧开始涌上来

translation.en: because now we have to get into mode to escape.
translation.zh: 因为我们现在必须进入逃生模式

translation.en: Police are looking for you, you don't have time to think,
translation.zh: 警察在找你 你没有时间多想

translation.en: and so this different type of thing hits.
translation.zh: 于是这时候 另一种感觉开始了

translation.en: You know, a different type of adrenaline.
translation.zh: 你懂的 另一种肾上腺素

translation.en: And after that moment, or that thing where…
translation.zh: 在那一刻之后 或者说在那里之后…

translation.en: Like when you almost get into a car accident but you don't,
translation.zh: 像是避开了一场差点卷进去的车祸

translation.en: and you're like, "Whew! That was fucking close, man."
translation.zh: 你会想说：“也太他妈险了 天啊”

translation.en: It was, like, fast, fast, fast.
translation.zh: 一切都是加速、加速

translation.en: I don't remember conversating. It was work time.
translation.zh: 我不记得有什么对话 那是干活儿的时间

translation.en: The boxes were quite big, and they were heavy as fuck.
translation.zh: 箱子挺大的 而且都死沉

translation.en: So, you got stacks of hundreds, stacks of twenties, stacks of fifties,
translation.zh: 所以 你有百元面额的成捆钞票 还有十元面额的 五十元面额的 而且它们都是真空包装

translation.en: and they're vacuum sealed so they're, like, perfect bricks.
translation.zh: 五十元面额的 而且它们都是真空包装 所以它们都是完好的砖块

translation.en: This stuff is happening in seconds, second, seconds, seconds, seconds.
translation.zh: 这些事像是几秒钟就完成了

translation.en: Boxes in the vehicle, garage door opens, we go out.
translation.zh: 箱子搬到车里 车库门打开 我们出发了

translation.en: I'm down in the well of the car.
translation.zh: 我躲在车座下面

translation.en: And then he parked so he could mail the boxes.
translation.zh: 然后他就停车了 去邮寄这些箱子

translation.en: We can't take it on a plane.
translation.zh: 我们不能带上飞机

translation.en: So, we mailed it.
translation.zh: 于是我们寄了出去

translation.en: Meanwhile, I'm trying to put these contacts in…
translation.zh: 同时 我在努力戴上这俩隐形眼镜…

translation.en: Oh, my God. [laughing]
translation.zh: 我的天呐

translation.en: I can't get these motherfuckers in my eyes.
translation.zh: 我做不到把这俩破玩意放进眼睛里

translation.en: "Oh, my God, you're cracking up."
translation.zh: “我的天 你要弄碎了”

translation.en: [chuckling] This is the moment where you lose your mind.
translation.zh: 这就是你失去理智的时刻

translation.en: Solis comes back.
translation.zh: 索利斯回来了

translation.en: "Okay, stay down!"
translation.zh: “好了 趴下！”

translation.en: I'm staying down.
translation.zh: 我还躲在下面

translation.en: And he said, "You know what those are? They're looking for you."
translation.zh: 然后他说：“你知道那些人 在干嘛吗？他们在找你”

translation.en: I did not know while I was in the wheel well of that car,
translation.zh: 因为我当时躲在车轮旁边我还没看到

translation.en: but my life as a fugitive began
translation.zh: 但随着那些直升机

translation.en: with the fluttering of those fucking helicopters
translation.zh: 盘旋在我的头顶 我作为逃犯的生活

translation.en: above my head.
translation.zh: 开始了
